MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH14 postcode area of Edinburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:55pm to make an urgent and safe repair to an underground cable on Craiglockhart Drive South and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:35pm on 1st March 2021.
